'''2.22.14''' is an update to the [[Minecraft Launcher|Launcher]] released on April 15, 2024.</onlyinclude>

== Changes ==
* New Home page in the Launcher released in "experimental" mode, users can switch it on in Launcher Settings

== Fixes ==
* Various UI improvements, bug fixes and code cleanup
* Quick Play bug fixes
